snippet: From 51st to 57th Streets, along a stretch of pedestrian arcades connected by crosswalks, New Yorkers can find themselves on "Sixth-and-a-Half Avenue."
abstract: From 51st to 57th Streets, along a stretch of pedestrian arcades connected by crosswalks, New Yorkers can find themselves on "Sixth-and-a-Half Avenue."

headline.main: In Midtown, Pedestrians' Secret Shortcut Is Now Official
